AVIVAPATIENT,SIX  666-00-0926    DOB-FEB 02, 1957 F   
Exm Date: NOV 20, 2011@07:00
Req Phys: AVIVAUSER,SEVEN                Pat Loc: 7 WEST MEDICINE/02-14-2014@18:
                                         Img Loc: RADIOLOGY MAIN FLOOR
                                         Service: MEDICINE
Pregnancy Screen: Patient answered no

 

(Case 54 COMPLETE)   CHEST 2 VIEWS PA&LAT             (RAD  Detailed) CPT:71020
     Reason for Study: follow up bilateral lower lobe pneumonia

    Clinical History:
      bilateral lower lobe pneumonia 

    Report Status: Verified                   Date Reported: NOV 20, 2011
                                              Date Verified: MAY 30, 2012
    Verifier E-Sig:

    Report:
      Comparison study: 11/19/2011. Lung volumes are normal
      bilaterally. Heart size is normal. The dense consolidations seen
      in both the right and the left lower lobes are much improved.  No
      pnuemothorax.  No definite effusion. 

    Impression:
      resolving bilateral lower lobe pneumonia.  

    Primary Diagnostic Code: ABNORMALITY, ATTN. NEEDED

Primary Interpreting Staff:
  THIRTYTWO AVIVAUSER, Staff Physician
          Verified by transcriptionist for THIRTYTWO AVIVAUSER
/AJC
text.author: AVIVAUSER,THIRTYTWO
